subtitle: An ideal vegetable to serve with Christmas turkey or any Sunday roast.

method.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large saucepan. Add the onion. Fry gently for 5 min until softened.
Stir in the allspice and cabbage. Fry for 5 min.
Pour in the cider. Season well. Bring to the boil. Cover and simmer for 8-10 min.
Mix in the redcurrant jelly. Carefully stir in the apple slices. Simmer for 5 min.
Stir in the chestnuts. Heat through and serve.

title: Braised red cabbage with chestnuts and apple
